explains: adj. 音乐的，配乐的；喜爱音乐的，精通音乐的；悦耳的，动听的
wordGroup: musical performance n. 演奏（会）；音乐表演
musical notation 乐谱；音乐符号
musical comedy 音乐喜剧；歌舞喜剧
broadway musical 百老汇音乐剧

sentences.en: I came from a musical family.
He had a soft, almost musical voice.
sentences.cn: 他有着轻柔悦耳的嗓音。

sentences.en: Almost everyone has some musical ability.
sentences.cn: 几乎人人都有一些音乐才能。
